title: Dalton Scale 2022: Finding a New Prime Meridian
itunes:title: Dalton Scale 2022: Finding a New Prime Meridian
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Patrick Claybon bring you the definitive quarterback power rankings for 2022 and break down this year's Dalton Scale. The heroes talk through their consensus list while searching for a new Prime Meridian to replace Andy Dalton, who was left off the list this year as he settles into his backup role.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
